mapper.select: SELECT *, YEAR((SELECT age FROM tbl_users)) as year, MONTH((SELECT age FROM tbl_users)) as month, DAY((SELECT age FROM tbl_users)) as day FROM tbl_users
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `tbl_users` ( username, password, enabled, nickname, email, phone, age ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{enabled}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{phone}, CONCAT( #{year}, '-', #{month}, '-', #{day} ) )
